Miscellaneous Highlights: The ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 in USA and West Indies gets underway on 1 June.
A total of three venues in the USA and six in the Caribbean will be used for the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
The blockbuster clash between India and Pakistan is scheduled for the new Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in Long Island on 9 June.
Others: The full fixtures and times for the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 can be found on ICC-Cricket.com.
